articles.title: 'On your bike' – Rio Ferdinand claims 'humble' Man Utd star has to leave in January - Football365
articles.description: Football365 - The midfielder has featured for just 141 minutes across all competitions for United this season.
articles.content:
Manchester United legend Rio Ferdinand has urged Donny van de Beek to “get on your bike” and claims the Dutch star “wouldn’t be there now” if he was representing him.
United signed Van de Beek from … [+2571 chars]
